definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: I'll stay judgement till I hear the other side.
sentences.chinese: 我要等聽了對方的辯詞之後才下判斷。

sentences.english: I can find no excuse for his behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 我對他的行爲找不到辯詞。

sentences.english: He marshals his arguments well, and almost never loses a court case.
sentences.chinese: 他將辯詞整理得非常好，幾乎從來沒有過失敗的案子。

sentences.english: The Supreme Court did not agree and quickly dismissed their application.
sentences.chinese: 最高法院沒有采信他們的辯詞，立即駁回他們的申訴。
